title: 超级斜坡，建筑工必备！
author: outsidero
txt_content:
你有想过制作一个更加真实的屋顶吗？别再为边角而烦恼了！



合成公式（所有合成都支持15种材料，下面少了一种）：
ceiling stairs: 

   
   
   



sloped floor:

   
   
   



sloped ceiling:

   
   
   



corner:

   
   
   



sloped angle:

   
   
   



ceiling angle:

   
   
   



slanted corner:

   
   
   



ceiling slanted corner:

   
   
   



oblique slope:

   
   
   



Inverted oblique slope:

   
   
   



slopes intersection:

   
  
   



inverted slopes intersection:
